title: TNF Preview, Week 2 WR/CB Matchups 2022
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp talk who needs to be in your lineup in a fantasy friendly Chargers-Chiefs Thursday Night Football game before talking the WR’s with great matchups who you need to start in Week 2. Then, Adam Schefter joins to talk the storylines to watch this week and before helping us assess what to expect from the 49ers backfield.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: Previewing Chargers-Chiefs, Best Week 2 Matchups, Storylines From Schefter
